name: SUKAKKO
description:
You like chess and strategy games? You love making up your own tactics? Sukakko is for you!

Sukakko is a strategy game, played on a chess-like board. It presents a brand new set of rules, unseen before.

Each player secretly selects every unit he will use in the battle, along with a commander to lead them. Each commander has a unique power that can be used once, and each unit moves and attacks in its own way. To be victorious, you will need to: take down the ennemy's commander OR destroy all his regular units.

What will be your strategy?

Features:
- Recruit your army, by choosing between 6 units and 5 commanders, each with a unique power.
- Test your tactics against the CPU.
- Challenge your friends to see who's the best tactician ! Multiplayer: Online with Steam Remote Play or local on same device.
- Vary board size for different experiences.
- High replayability.

Gather with your friends and family and challenge them!
